mapper.select: SELECT m.market_id marketId, m.member_id memberId, m.title, m.product_name productName, m.price, f.file thumbNailImage, COUNT(f.market_id) hasFile FROM Market m LEFT JOIN MarketFile f ON m.market_id = f.market_id GROUP BY m.market_id ORDER BY m.market_id DESC;
SELECT market_id marketId, member_id memberId, title, content, inserted, price, product_name productName, view_count viewCount, enable FROM Market WHERE market_id = #{market_id}

SELECT m.market_id marketId, m.member_id memberId, m.title, mem.nickname, m.price, m.product_name productName, m.enable, f.file thumbNailImage FROM Market m LEFT JOIN MarketFile f ON m.market_id = f.market_id LEFT JOIN Member mem ON m.member_id = mem.member_id WHERE m.market_id = #{marketId} GROUP BY marketId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OrderPay(member_id, product_name, final_price, quantity) VALUES(#{partner_user_id}, #{item_name}, #{amount.total}, #{quantity})
